content.description: Climb up into a nice small ledge on the right side of the wall.  Mantle up onto this ledge and work up onto your tip toes and reach as high as you can to gain a bad sloper!!!  Work your way up onto the very high slab via mostly bad holds (Scary!!!) to the finish.
content.protection: Lots of Pads and a few Spotters are best.
content.location: Head towards Gilligan's Island and continue around to the far North side past the "Pirates Cove."  Continue into the "Tortuga Area" by holding a northern course and eventually passing"The Pearl."  Once passed "The Pearl" trend right (North/East) making your way to the South facing supper high wall of the largest and most prominent feature that by now should be right before your eyes. Fun place to climb.

content.description: Just left of "The Ungoverned" on the same rail system.  Work your way up and left towards "Beat To Corners"
content.location: Head towards Gilligan's Island and continue around to the far North side past the "Pirates Cove."  Continue into the "Tortuga Area" by holding a northern course and eventually passing"The Pearl."  Once passed "The Pearl" trend right (North/East) making your way to the South facing supper high wall of the largest and most prominent feature that by now should be right before your eyes. Fun place to climb.

content.description:
Start on the left most side of the Tortuga South wall just before an obvious dirty gully break break in the wall.

Start in a low jug below a shallow, right-facing corner that slowly arches to the right. From this jug, work up and right following the arching feature until you reach a small triangle roof feature that marks the end of the arch.  From here, push straight up via side pulls and slopers to gain an okay stance just above the small, triangle feature.

Finish by climbing sightly left over to the break in the wall. Once you reach the break, proceed to downclimb to safety.

This is one of my favorites on the South Wall so far! A must do!!!
content.protection: Pads and spotters. It's best to get as many of both as you can for this wall!!
content.location: The Tortuga South wall is located just behind (North) of the Gilligan's Islands formation.  The South Wall is just past and visible from the classic line "The Pearl."  Happy hunting!!
